title: (15570) Narón - 28 Igrexa
description: Quiet parking with park for children

title: (15510) Neda - Aldea Cruz do Pouso
description: Viewpoint with beautiful views of the entire Ferrol estuary. Asphalted parking area, with no nearby services. It is accessed by a fairly narrow asphalt road. Very crowded during the day and early at night. It is not the best place to sleep, but it is well worth staying to watch the sunset.

title: (15510) Neda - 16 Lugar Empedron
description: Small parking lot on the banks of the Rio Grande de Xubia, next to it there is a park for the little ones and from this point there are several hiking and walking routes, it is a quiet place to spend the night and has splendid views.

title: (15540) Narón - 18 Rúa Bernardo Romero
description: Naron area. Waste water discharge point. You can spend the night without a problem (and provided it is done correctly) anywhere in the city, about 2 km away. Which is where hotel services and shops are. There is a petrol station about 50 Ortegal

title: (15572) O Río Seco - 46 Rúa Río Seco
title_short: (15572) O Río Seco - 46 Rúa Río Seco
description: push button water fountain

name: Camping municipal de Rio Xubia
title: (15597) Camping municipal de Rio Xubia
description: Ideal place in the middle of nature, river fishing options, hiking, mountain biking routes, motocross and many options. There are tables for picnic and plenty of space.

title: (15597) - 31 Lugar Gaiba
description: Pedroso Recreation Area (Narón). Ample parking with shade, next to the barbecue area and river with the possibility of bathing.

title: (15510) Neda - 15 Lugar Ribeira Toeleira
description: Very quiet public parking. Space to rest and sleep. Promenade and park, view of the estuary, near the Camino de Santiago hostel.

title: (15541) Narón - 43 Lugar do Cruceiro
description: Gas station with water loading point and gray water discharge. They also sell LPG.

title: (15572) Narón - Lugar de Arriba
description:
Parking right in front of the sports center.
service area a few kilometers to make services.

name: Área de autocaravanas
title: (15541) Área de autocaravanas
description: Private motorhome area "Campo Base 360 Valdoviño". With all services and very close to the famous beaches of Valdoviño and Pantin, bus stop less than 20 m to go to the beach or to the nearby cities of Ferrol, Cedeira and Valdoviño. Large squares 10m long by 6m wide. Bar/Restaurant on the premises. Hours from 9:00 to 11:00 Opening on July 1, 2022

title: (15552) Valdoviño - 87 Avenida Porta do Sol
description: Gas station with water. It also has toilets outside . Vehicle washing area. Clean bathrooms. Also butane and propane gas. Cepsa and Repsol. shell gas station

title: (15540) Narón - 4 Lugar Campo Ratas Trasancos
description: I / O service area Cepsa Cooperativa Meiras - San Mateo - Naron

title: (15510) Neda - 73 Avenida Algeciras
description: Beautiful self-service laundry, with vending machines, books to read and exclusive washing machine to remove pet hair.

title: (15572) Narón - 10D Rúa Martínez de la Rosa
title_short: (15572) Narón - 10D Rúa Martínez de la Rosa
description: Parking next to a park to walk and perfect to go with children. Close to the center of Narón with bars, bakeries, supermarkets within 600m. It is below the highway but there is no excessive noise to stay overnight. Perfect to stay, take a walk and coller provisions. Ample spaces and enough quantity, little probable not to clog parking.

name: A Frouxeira Camper Park
title: (15552) A Frouxeira Camper Park
description:
Area with large delimited squares with drinking water and electricity service in each plot. It has hot showers (also for users in transit), toilets, WIFI zone, free bike loan, electric motorcycle rental, swimming pool, barbecue, picnic area, children's playground and daily bread and pastry service.

500 meters from the center, 1.5 KM from the well-known Frouxeira beach (ideal for surfing) and the Frouxeira lake (natural wetland of great importance for biodiversity). Spectacular sunsets and panoramic views of the beach and lagoon.

To enter without crossing the continuous line, there is an esplanade 200 meters away where you can make a U-turn and access in the direction of travel.

You can check availability and make a reservation through the website. 

Automated access through vehicle license plate recognition.

In-person reception hours:
- Mornings from 10:00 to 12:00
- Afternoons from 18:30 to 21:30
24 hour telephone reception.

title: (15570) Narón - 22 Lugar Picota
description: Very quiet place, next to a monastery, only some distant noise from the highway but at night you hardly hear anything.

name: Fontesin Camping
title: (15550) Fontesin Camping
description: Fontesin Camping. The surroundings, the beaches, the tranquility and the familiar treatment make it an ideal destiny, as much for the campers of passage as those of season.

title: (15552) Valdoviño - 26 AC-566
description: Laundry with washer and dryer service, various sizes and prices.

title: (15550) Valdoviño - Unnamed Road
description: Campelo beach. Beautiful beach.

title: (15552) Valdoviño - 2 Rúa Espadana
description: Dead end street but with the possibility of parking and spending the night, 100m from the town center and 5 min walk from the beach.

title: () Os Vilares -
description: In the middle of nature, part of the "Senda Ártabra", a good place to sleep. Very close to other points already marked. Good view. Path suitable for 4x4 as standard but it cannot be continued, only on foot/bike/motorcycle/quad

title: (15405) - Rúa Rio do Enxerto
description: Parking Lidl, Carrefour, Media markt. Several shops and petrol station. Quiet sleep.

title: (15560) San Sadurniño - 11 O Casal
description: New area and still not cemented but has water filling and emptying services. thank you to the town

title: (15550) Valdoviño - 74 Aldea Taraza
description: Praia do Rio, parking under the pines, nice beach below, public showers and toilets

title: (15541) Narón - Unnamed Road
description: Magnificent little place in the peace surrounded by nature. access to a cove. difficult access but it was ok in vw transport and trafic

title: (15577) Neda - 9 Lugar Fervenza
description: Land parking near the Pazo Isabel II. Somewhat inclined and close to the road but quiet. No shadows and no services. People often park here to go see the Belelle waterfall (fervenza). The circular route from here is about 7.5 km.

title: (15550) Lavacerido - 129 Lugar Lavacerido
description: Ici plateforme vide juste poubelles ! Mais à 15 m le bonheur : toilettes extérieures et restaurant sympa.

title: (15550) Valdoviño - 33 Aldea Lavacerido
description: Beautiful beach called meirás, with a fairly large parking lot, very uneven, but very quiet, with restrooms and restaurants.

name: Camping Valdoviño
title: (15552) Camping Valdoviño
description: Valdoviño, 30 Carretera Playa. Camping Valdoviño. Spacious & clean sanitary. 5 minutes walk from the beaches. Restaurants & shop in the camp. Other bars & restaurants nearby. WiFi throughout the campsite

name: Camping A Lagoa
title: (15552) Camping A Lagoa
description: Parque novo, bom bar e restaurante, perto da praia, WC s em condições, recomendo

title: (15510) Neda - 24 Lugar Puntal Abaixo
description: Esplanade of a small fishing pier, a good place to make a stop to rest, with a small beach where you can stretch your legs. there are no services, only esplanade where half a dozen vans fit

title: (15550) Valdoviño - 1 Aldea Taraza
description: Small car park on the heights. Magnificent view. Small beaches below. No service

title: (15570) Narón - 6 Rua Rafael Barez
description: Public parking with many places.

title: (15552) Valdoviño - 25 Aldea a Lagoa
description: Parking next to the beach.

title: (15550) Valdoviño - Unnamed Road
description: Small land between sand and grass 20 meters from the beach. It is very easy to access

title: (15550) Valdoviño - Aldea Taraza
description: The course is on a gravel road next to the asphalt road. It's a bit hidden from the thicket. But too small and bumpy for motorhomes. Please leave everything clean.

title: (15550) Lavacerido -
description: Small car park overlooking the beach. 3 or 4 flat pitches widely spaced from each other. access by a small sandy path or a rocky slab. (access via the rocky slab ok with a 7.4m motorhome) direct access to the very beautiful beach of valdoviño. magnificent view from the lighthouse 5 min walk.

title: (15550) Valdoviño - Unnamed Road
description: Nice parking space with former infrastructure. No more service today. Great location.

title: (15570) Narón - 144 Estrada Gándara
description: Public parking of the municipal swimming pool. There are no services, only parking. You can access the pool and showers paying entrance fee. It is located in an urban area, so there is some noise in the morning. All kinds of shops in the area, 10 minutes walk from the Odeon shopping center.

title: (15500) Fene - 40 Avenida Mar
description: Perfect for night, or spend the day. Supermarket next door, wc and shower on the beach.

title: (15550) Valdoviño - Punta Frouxeira
description: At the foot of the Frouxeiro lighthouse, risk of wind but grandiose panorama, carefree bivouac but no service. Many facilities for bivouacking in this region, be careful not to unpack tables and armchairs under the blind, it is forbidden by the local authorities.

title: (15550) Valdoviño - Unnamed Road
description: First track passable in 4X4 left when returning from the lighthouse. Very quiet, great view.

title: (15550) - Unnamed Road
description: Magnificent place surrounded by nature. May not be suitable for large vehicles. Cliffs, ocean view and Valdoviño beach.

title: (15500) Fene - 1 Avenida Mar
description: Ample and little crowded parking. To make a stop or rest. Supermarket at 100 meters, promenade and recreation area. Illuminated and quiet at night. In the immediate vicinity there are sources of drinking water. Sports Center. Coffee shops.

title: (15404) Ferrol - 114 Rúa Bertón
description: Quiet streets with parking area. Little car traffic, little noise. Nearby dog park.

title: (15552) Valdoviño - 33 Lugar Ventureira
description: Mirador do paraño. Spectacular views. Tables and some shade.

title: (15500) Fene - 3 Rúa San Salvador
description: Laundry 8, 13 and 17kg / 3 dryers 17kg. Lots of places nearby, very clean, toilets, distributor, wifi and seats to wait (between 20 and 30min for the programs)

title: (15500) Fene - 31-15 Estrada da Palma
description: Parking of a supermarket 'Dia'. Quiet. No barrier.

title: (15594) Ferrol - 97 Aldea Covarradeiras
description: Surfers and Kiters, sandy place; very wild; nice beach clean below. this is also a paragliding landing site. some cars are coming ad going during the day, but pretty quiet. police comes several times a day to check that no one really settles in. vans are tolerated

title: (15401) Ferrol - 68 Avenida do Rei
description: Great place to park very close to the center and visit the city. Very spacious.

title: (15405) Ferrol - Estrada Malata
description: Service area with a large parking area in a sports area with emptying of gray and black water and a fountain with a button for filling with good flow but difficult to hook up the hose.

title: (15403) Ferrol - 17 Rúa Naturista López Seoane
description: Small laundry. Good and free parking nearby also for high vehicles. WiFi in the salon.

title: (15554) Valdoviño - Vedado de Caza
description: It is a chapel called "ermida de liñeiro / capela da fame" with its field between trees. It is perfect both for sleeping and for stopping to eat. Especially if the parking lot on the beach is full and they don't let you access it. Vilarube beach is 5 minutes away. You have to go up a slope that is in front of the beach access and is in the direction of the reservoir (encoro das forcadas). There is a fairly steep ramp.

title: (15403) Ferrol - 31 Avenida de Mac Mahón
description: Esplana of a business closing next to a military base. Ideal for visiting the military museum.

title: (15553) O Rodo - 15 Lugar Rodo
description: Parking by the beach, sand and grass, fairly flat and big. amenities, picnic tables, games for children and a small restaurant right next to it. parking permits day and night. Warning ! do not unpack anything please: no hold etc ...

title: (15594) Sartaña - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful parking lot from the beach. It's very clean. No height restriction, but overnight stays are prohibited. There are garbage cans and showers. Please take your rubbish with you!!! Also handkerchiefs. And do not stay overnight so that the community retains this space. Thanks :)

title: (15405) Ferrol - 3 Carretera Estrada da Malata
description: Public car park of the sports hall of La Malata, Ferrol. It is very close to the caravan area, which was just not available when we arrived for a rally. Paved and signposted, it has a bar next to it. There is no sign that you cannot stay overnight.

title: (15553) O Rodo - 15 Lugar Rodo
description: Pantin Beach. Beautiful panoramic view. Quiet for the night.

title: (15553) Valdoviño - Estrada da Costa
description: Day or night spot above the famous Pantìn beach, incredible 360 view and breathtaking sunset! Quiet area easily accessible by van and motorhome with very little traffic (a few cars during the day and hikers). Only downside: mosquitoes!

title: (15401) Ferrol - 23 Rúa Maiola
description: Day parking, supermarkets nearby, shops, laundry, you can walk down to the city center

title: (15553) Valdoviño - 28D Lugar Ariño
description: Free parking just a few steps from Pantin beach.

title: (15594) Ferrol - Unnamed Road
description: Small area for parking with access to the small child-friendly beach and quiet, wave-protected lagoon. On the large beach with the surfers there are beach showers and Dixi toilets.

title: (15553) Freixo - 2 Lugar Ariño
description: RV parking, no service but nice to spend the night, beach next to it and nice view, the showers now with the ceiling closed.

title: (15553) O Freixo - 15 Lugar Ariño
description:
Free parking used by surfers.
Straight floor with wonderful views of Pantin Beach.
Cold showers and toilets.

title: (15594) Ferrol - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place to park all day and all night. Lots of wind all day. Very popular during the day, because the beach and the views are spectacular. With water and showers.

title: (15594) O Ferrol - Unnamed Road
description: Beach of Santa Comba. Parking in both areas. free and with great beach and Anse. Access by a steep wooden stairs without banners of dogs or anything.

title: (15590) Ferrol - 4 Carretera Cabana
description: Park with picnic tables, behind the park there are parking areas, there is no water or fountains. In this area of Ferrol, it is the only place I see where you can have a picnic, I have not seen other places along this coastal area (not even in the nearby forests), in the afternoons there are a lot of people, but I'm sure Is there a free table, greetings travelers

title: (15401) Ferrol - 65 Rúa Espartero
description:
Nice laundrette with WiFi and coffee machine.

Wheelchair accessible.

title: (15563) San Ramon (Moeche) - 19 Carretera Feria
description: Self-service laundry "A Colada Agarimo" Hours every day from 08:00 to 22:00, 3 washing machines, 2 dryers, ironing area...

title: (15401) Ferrol - Estrada Porto Graña
description: Parking in battery stuck to a street and the port does not pass people the only noise is the cars that pass but it is the closest thing I found in the town

title: (15528) Fene - Cabanas - N-651
description: gas station with shower

title: (15401) Ferrol - Rúa Castro
description: Parking in a dead end on the edge of the port. A bit of passage in the evening, but we slept quietly. lots of free space at 8am.

title: (15553) A Gabeira - 4 Lugar Gabeira
description: Parking surrounded by eucalyptus and facing the beach. Uncrowded place and in addition we can surf. Quiet night.

title: (15500) Fene - v Astano Parcela B3
description: Gasoline service area can be washed the motorhome, with parking in the immediate vicinity and a supermarket nearby with parking. The gas station has a shop and restaurant

title: (15594) Ferrol - DP-3606
description: Public fountain

title: (15593) Ferrol - DP-3606
description: Free parking with WC and beach shower nearby

title: (15554) Valdoviño - 19 Lugar Atalaia
description: Parking at Villarrube beach, one of the coolest in the north for me. It's calm and you fall asleep to the sound of the waves. You are always accompanied at night because it is a beach frequented by surfers all year round. We went over Easter. Small vehicles only

name: Camping As Cabazas
title: (15593) Camping As Cabazas
description: Camping As Cabazas, blue ocean, the intense greens of the exhuberante vegetation and the white sands arrive almost to the doors of the campsite

title: (15553) Valdoviño - Unnamed Road
description: Amazing point of view after Pantin beach, between forest, cliffs and huge ocean view ! Only space for 2 or 3 vans as it’s not really a parking but a small concrete path leading to the point of view with two banches. Very quiet and beautiful!!

title: (15594) Ferrol - 283 DP-3603
description: Spectacular view. False GPS point that leads to a complicated dead end or U-turn. Take the front street to the right in the village plage santa comba.

title: (15590) Ferrol - 36 Rúa Real Baixa
description: Drinking water fountain with tap

title: (15594) Ferrol - 221 Prioiro
description: Various places on the lawn near the dunes, we spent a quiet night

title: (15563) A Ponte do Norte -
description: Parking next to the Moeche pools. Possibility of bathing in the pools for a fee or the adjacent fluvial pool. Small picnic area with bar, play area and services during opening hours

title: (15593) Ferrol - 114 Aldea Vilar
description: The terrain is a bit uneven but the small beach and the views are impressive.

title: (15553) Valdoviño - Unnamed Road
description: Small nice quiet picnic area

title: (15591) Brión -
description: Site accessible by the Aldea Brión, from which starts (43.4784391, -8.2756914) a fairly easy dirt forest path (access in dry weather with a CC of 7m). The spot is perfectly flat, could accommodate a good number of trucks, we didn't see anyone there between 8 p.m. and noon the next day. A few steps from the plateau, incredible panoramic views of Ferrol, La Coruña in the distance. Departures for walks in lush vegetation + several mountain bike trails are directly within reach. The site adjoins an apparently disused military area.

title: (15563) San Xurxo de Moeche - 3 Camiño Fonte
title_short: (15563) San Xurxo de Moeche - 3 Camiño Fonte
description: Quiet place next to very nice cemetery. restaurant at 50 meters.

title: (15620) Mugardos - 48 Avenida Mar
description: Car park

title: (15620) Mugardos - 15 Santa Lucía
description: Parking of the church of San Vicente de Mehá. Very very quiet place with beautiful views of the river. Without height limit or restrictions. 5 minutes walk from the city center. Recommended to visit Mugardos in summer.

title: (15626) Franza - 16 Avenida Francisco Vizoso
description: Butane gas service belonging to the Monica Bar and tobacconist.

title: (15626) Mugardos - 2 Rúa San Victorio
description: Quiet parking in Franza, 50 meters from Bar Mónica where there is gas butane service and tobacconist, you can also visit the area where there are various bars and walking routes that can reach O Seixo (2.5km) or Ares at the same distance more or less.

title: (15620) Mugardos - 66 AC-133
description: Lavalux Laundry

title: (15592) Vila Da Area - 100 Vila Área Núcleo
title_short: (15592) Vila Da Area - 100 Vila Área Núcleo
description: Parking at the dunes, water monitoring, showers, garbage cans. Parking for 6 hours. very quiet place. Toilets have been removed.

title: (15594) A Fonte Da Tella -
description: For minicampers or small jacket. Sheltered from wind and rain. If you're not paranoid, sleep in an abandoned barracks. it is much better than in faro

title: (15594) Ferrol -
description: Small car park at the end of a small, very narrow paved road, location for 3 or 4 Max motorhomes, very isolated, very wild.

title: (15594) Ferrol - Prioiro Núcleo
description: Cabo Prior lighthouse parking with magnificent views of 2 bays without any convenience (sunrise and sunset assured). Rather windy.

title: () Cedeira -
description: Perfect parking to go up to the Castillo de la Concepción

title: (15609) Pontedeume - DP-6902
description: Parking attached to the river. It has picnic area and barbecue. They usually park motorhomes etc ...

title: (15357) Cedeira - Rúa Area Longa
description: Location wrongly positioned. The coordinates lead to the harbor and nothing to do with the photos. In fact, this place is above the harbor. The road from the city is very narrow even for a car ... We went on foot but impossible from the city by camper.

title: (15620) Mugardos - 50 Aldea a Redonda
description: Small parking on the ground. Very quiet place to spend the night and with excellent views. A few meters from La Palma castle and the lighthouse. If you continue forward there is a track of about 6 km where you can park perfectly. Incredible views

title: (15357) Cedeira - Rúa Area Longa
description: Maximum stay, 48 hours. Only parking and no camping is allowed. Very close to the beach and downtown. In summer it tends to be very busy during the day, but hassle free at night. Food and store services are central.

title: (15555) Cedeira - 71 Camiño Real da Magdalena
description: Parking by the sea.

title: (15609) Pontedeume - DP-6902
description: Nice quiet place by the river. Picnic benches and barbecue available. Protected area at night prohibited

title: (15609) Pontedeume - DP-6902
description: Recreational area next to the Eume River in the Natural Park of Las Fragas del Eume. Here begin hiking and mountain biking routes there is water Potable

title: (15357) Cedeira - 2710 Rùa Casa Do Pescador
description: 48-hour parking for motorhomes in the port, 3 minutes walk from the city. Quiet location. Very nice views.

title: (15627) Fene - 19A Lugar Rio Castro
description: Ample and level parking. Easy access to beaches and next to a very nice and cheap pizzeria. Very quiet place.

title: (15623) Ares - 12 Avenida Redes
description:
It is a parking lot on a small beach with beautiful views. You have to be careful with the way you access it since Google Maps can get you through complicated roads. We travel with a 6m Camper. and to get the gps we got into some somewhat complicated roads, the next day to leave we were guided by Google maps but without gps and we had no problem.
So follow the main roads when going to the site, no shortcuts with bigger motorhomes! We had to turn around once due to small streets.

Make sure to take the walk starting at the parking lot through the forest to the next small city Redes. Very beautiful small authentic city.

title: (15357) Vilacacín -
description: Hermitage and Mirador de Santo Anton de Corveiro. Spectacular❤️

title: (15623) Ares - 23 Avenida Mediterráneo
description: Parking in urbanization, next to a day center... At least on Sundays it is empty and you can leave the AC quietly. Closer to the town it is difficult to find such an accessible parking

name: Bar O Emigrante
title: (15627) Bar O Emigrante
description: Wide esplanade with access to a beautiful cove. There is a bar with a terrace. You can spend the night without problem. CLARIFICATION: the place is a private property, its owner is the owner of the Restaurant, it is recommended to request permission for the overnight stay and behave civically

title: (15623) Ares - 10 Calle Paralelo
description: In Redes there is a car park but it is usually full and has spaces for cars, they are not valid for caravans. On this street there are car parks painted in white so you can park. We have spent the night and without problem.

title: (15593) Doniños - 155 Camiño tras Outeiro
description:
Area without services in front of the Doñinos beach. Surfers area with a lot of atmosphere and a bar/restaurant almost on the same sand.
The beach is fine sand, very long and with enough waves and dunes.
A very quiet area and recommended to spend the night.

title: (15350) Cedeira - 15 Camiño Real da Magdalena
description: Small but quiet parking, comfortable to visit the town and next to the beach.

title: (15350) Cedeira - 88 AC-566
description: Parking area very wide. no parking meter. of earth and gravel. 5 minutes from the town center. with supermarkets nearby and restaurant bars. I think it is possible to spend the night.

title: (15592) San Jorge Ferrol - 188 Camiño tras Outeiro
title_short: (15592) San Jorge Ferrol - 188 Camiño tras Outeiro
description: Authorized motorhome parking

title: (15623) Ares - 1 Aldea Redes
description: Parking without prohibition sign, difficult to park for large motorhome, quiet place

title: (15592) O Outeiro - Calle Nombre
description:
Big public parking at the beach of Doninos.
Open air showers, direct acces to the beach, nice forrest, paved parking but not totally flat. Quiet during the night. Beloved spot for surfers.

title: (15592) Vila Da Area -
description: Calm area 10min walking distance to the beach. The beach itself was full of seagrass. Many spots to stay in the shade. Others only reachable by 4x4 - beware. Nice stay overnight.

title: (15623) Ares - 85 Aldea Seselle
description: Parking on the beach with views of all estuaries. I only recommend small motorhomes the places are small.

title: (15623) Ares - 107 Lugar Seselle
description: Large and level parking more or less, next to the beach, with beautiful views and with nearby houses, quiet, but shared with cars.

title: (15621) Cabañas - 53 Avenida Arenal
description: Drinking water fountain along the way

name: Camping O Raso A Coruña
title: (15623) Camping O Raso A Coruña
description: Camping by the sea. Very quiet and shady. Wonderful view of the Rio of Ares. Superb and great beach 10 meters. Young Manager friendly. Nice step.

title: (15350) Cedeira - 16 Rúa Ortigueira
description: Parking area in front of a very beautiful park and a river. On the outskirts of town. Very quiet to sleep. Public toilets open right next door.

name: AresPark Autocaravanas
title: (15624) AresPark Autocaravanas
description: Area for motorhomes / camper / caravans. Located in the city center, it has all the services. At 5 minutes we have the Park and the Beach. Price: Includes electricity, discharge/charge of water, bathrooms and common areas. Possibility of space without electricity (ask for price). Prices may be subject to change: According to season, offers, long stay, etc.

title: (15623) Ares - Rúa Nova
description: Small quiet car park, with access to a beautiful little beach. Please note that the access is too narrow for motorhomes, only cars and vans can access it. Few parking spaces, a few cars during the day but no one there at night.

title: (15621) Cabañas - 29a Rúa Adeza
description: Parking of the Magdalena Beach (there is an area where dogs are allowed) When you reach the roundabout, take the second exit, the parking lot is right where there are some chestnut trees. Views of the sea but close to a train line. There are no services.

title: (15621) Cabanas - 4 Calle Dia Ocho
description: It is a small parking lot where you can stay to rent small and large vans, the motorhomes surely also enter some, it is right next to the rowing club, and it has an access with a pontoon to be able to go kayaking or paddle surfing, the quiet night, There is no sign prohibiting parking or parking.

name: hotel fraga do eume
title: (15613) hotel fraga do eume
description: Private area, but without the possibility of emptying. Very quiet, located in the entrance portal to the Fragas do Eume natural park. Request authorization to enter the nearby Fragas do Eume hotel or the Casa Peizas restaurant Within a hundred meters you have the hotel and the Casa Peizas restaurant, with local cuisine and bar. Number of excursions in the natural park, with river and beautiful deciduous forests. Also near Forgoselo, a good place to catch mushrooms. Less than five minutes a well-equipped sports climbing school with a variety of grades, from IV to 7c and another classic climbing area in the canyon with easy tracks of several lengths. It is closed with a chain, so that they open you have to call the hotel reception

title: (15621) Cabañas - 1 Avenida Arenal
description: Landscaped park with public toilets, water point and numerous games for children. Perfect for a meal break or relaxation with the children.

title: (15621) Cabañas - 2 Avenida Arenal
description: Ideal parking to visit Pontedeume (cross the bridge on foot are 6 minutes) or go to Cabañas beach (5 minutes). No problem for all sizes of motorhome. You must go around the roundabout to access the highway and access the car park located on the right. Comfortable and practical

title: (15624) Ares - 34 Avenida Saavedra Meneses
description: Parking area next to the beach promenade, with trees. From September 1 you can park without problem, only blue zone in summer. Quiet, movement in the morning. near bars, restaurants, playground, promenade and beach.

title: (15593) Ferrol - 1 Lugar Punta Penencia
description: Small parking on the beach with toilets and showers on the beach. Also is a small restaurant nearby. The parking is a good alternative to the place on the cliffs. We did not want to drive up with our Cali due to the washed out roads. Nice spot also for several nights.

title: (15600) Pontedeume - 77 Avenida Ferrol
description: Arriving at the Pontedeume halt, we have the so-called Fonte da Estación. Place where from long ago it was going to collect water.

title: (15600) Pontedeume - nº1 Avenida Coruña
description: Self-service laundry.

title: (15600) Pontedeume - 10 Avenida Ricardo Sánchez
description: It is a very quiet sandy parking lot. It is not quite level, but it sleeps perfectly. Cafe next door and in the middle of the city.

title: (15624) Ares - 9 Rúa Coronel José Gabeiras
description: Good area, quiet. Although it does not have any type of service. If you go further to the end of the street, in the Club Náutico area, it is a little quieter, as there is no car traffic.

title: (15614) Pontedeume - 35 Avenida Ricardo Sánchez
description: Close to the hospital, park and estuary... quite level last with space for about 15 AC

title: (15617) Monfero - DP-6902
description: Small dirt parking a bit sloping 1.5 km after the interpretation center, which also has another small parking and to which access is easier.  From there, you reach by a narrow road next to the river Eume, if you are facing another vehicle one will have to go back to a crossing zone.  Located next to the first suspension bridge (ideal for going to the monastery), next to a small building (closed) and public toilets (open, Turkish type).  There is no service, only parking and bivouac.  If it rains, the trees drip onto the vehicle and it becomes uncomfortable.  Pretty isolated (we were alone).

title: (15625) Ares - 178 Lugar Chanteiro
description: Large parking lot, with water, beach 50 meters away, very quiet place, we spent one night and passed the Civil Guard. No problem.

title: (15565) As Somozas - 37 Igrexa
description: Public fountain

title: (15625) Ares - 250 CP-0402
description: Small esplanada / parking next to the Battery of Salgueira. Lovely sunset walking towards the tip. We have spent a very quiet night. Place without any service.

title: (15600) Pontedeume - 8 CP-6901
description: Small parking lot of the San Miguel de Breamo hermitage. It is located at the end of the road, surrounded by nature and quite flat. We have spent the night here with no problem. They fit a couple of camper. In the morning, neighbors come for a walk.

name: Camping O Parral. Chanteiro
title: (15625) Camping O Parral. Chanteiro
description: Small and familiar camping. Minimum services. Outdated. Shading. Next to the beach. Terrace and restaurant overlooking the beach.

title: (15565) As Somozas - 64 Rúa das Oliveiras
description: As Somozas is located at the eastern end of the province of A Coruña, which belongs to the comarca of Ferrol. The A Queiroga Recreation Area, on the banks of the Mera, is an appropriate spot for trout fishing and is also frequented by people looking to enjoy nature.

title: (15569) A Casilla - 2 AC-862
description: Fantastic place in the middle of nature for a food stop and fresh mountain water

title: (15625) Chanteiro - Unnamed Road
description: Parking for the local climbing sectors. easy levelling, directly on the coast with a view on the industrial harbor opposite. no services. accesible by dirt road. only for vans.

name: Camping Ber Door
title: (15607) Camping Ber Door
description: Camping Ber Door, friendly and welcoming campsite, beautiful plot delimited by hedges with water and electricity, sea view and beach 300 m away

title: (15607) Pontedeume - 14 Ber
description: Parking 25 meters from the beach.

name: Camping Ber
title: (15607) Camping Ber
description: Camping Ber. The proximity of Ber Beach is the reason for its name, this campsite is characterized by its tranquility and the surrounding environment. The area in which it is located offers many options for the enjoyment of free time; its landscapes, its natural monuments, its historical monuments and also the beaches which surround us, are the ideal entertainment for the leisure moments of the summer season.

title: (15625) Ares - Unnamed Road
description: TOP site. Sunset for pure photography. Nothing more to say.

name: Área de autocaravanas fragas del Eume
title: (15617) Área de autocaravanas fragas del Eume
title_short: (15617) Área de autocaravanas fragas del Eume
description:
EUME FRAGAS PRIVATE AREA


Private motorhome area where you can enjoy the tranquility of the mountain.


- SERVICES: 12 places with electricity, 20 places without electricity, 10 showers, washing machine/dryer, water emptying and filling area, dining room with sink, microwave, fridge, tables. .. , vending machine for drinks and snacks where you can also change clothes, picnic areas with barbecue, children's play area, swimming pool...
Baker, meats for barbecue, charcoal, there is a supermarket 1.5 km away for small purchases (Ponte da Pedra cooperative)

We have marked hiking routes that start from the same area, 4x4 excursions through the Fragas del Eume and a children's playground, nature workshop, swimming pool...

title: (15593) Ferrol - Unnamed Road
description: Parking of the Cape Prioriño, magnificent views over the Ferrol ares coruña river, quiet place to spend the night, there is a lot of wind.

title: (15607) Boebre - Boebre
description: Place in a beautiful pine forest, directly above the sea.

title: (15325) As Pontes de García Rodríguez - 8 Carretera de Pontedeume as Pontes
title_short: (15325) As Pontes de García Rodríguez - 8 Carretera de Pontedeume as Pontes
description: Paved and flat car park for the village church, with a fountain, two sheds and one with a table and barbecue. Quiet place.

title: (15347) Cedeira - CP-2203
description:
Parking of the "Miradoiro de Punta Candieira". Quiet location with a view. There is a 2nd parking after the 1st bend, larger but less flat. For large motorhomes (>6m), do not go further towards the lighthouse because you risk going up the 7 switchbacks in reverse.
We didn't sleep there, only ate lunch.

title: (15607) Pontedeume - 132 A Ínsua
description: Nice little quiet corner, van access only.

title: (15616) Vilarmaior - 9 Lugar Eirexa
description: Large fairly flat gravelled area, water point, very quiet green area

title: (15607) A Herbosa - 1 Carretera Perbes Arbosa
description: Good parking to go to the beach, The price is 2.5 euros. Place with tables to eat next to the cliff.

name: Camping Fragadeume
title: (15617) Camping Fragadeume
description: Camping Fragadeume at the doors of the Natural Park "Fragas do Eume".

title: (15639) Miño - AP-9
description: Parking space and water change. Helpful staff with picnic area and stores. They have a hose to fill and a screen for black and gray water. Numerous parking spaces with the possibility of staying overnight.

name: Rocamar campsite
title: (15608) Rocamar campsite
description: Rocamar campsite.

title: (15617) Monfero - Unnamed Road
description: Flat space in the middle of nature. I agreed with my T4, but I would only recommend it for 4x4.

title: (15358) Reboredo - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet off-road parking, unpaved, good alternative for rest when the wind is howling at the Miradores in front.

name: Camping Perbes
title: (15608) Camping Perbes
description: Camping Perbes rustic and family camping.

title: (15639) Miño - 14 Avenida de Xarío
description: Ample parking on asphalt, slightly downhill, very quiet at night.

title: (15358) Cedeira - Unnamed Road
description: Mirador dos carris

title: (15358) Cedeira - 97 Calle San Andres de Teixido
title_short: (15358) Cedeira - 97 Calle San Andres de Teixido
description: We are located 360m above the sea in a small flat area called Chao do Monte. The road passes here and the road that will take us to the sanctuary of San Andrés de Teixido. The place is accompanied by a small relaxation area composed of a few tables. Ideal for stopping off to visit the small town, it is barely 1 km away on foot.

title: (15177) Oleiros - 969 Rúa do Portelo
description: Port of Lorbé, a very special and spectacular place. It deserves a visit. You can park in the port to enjoy the views and to sleep, at the entrance there are several marked parking spaces. We have been there many times without problem. All night there are fishermen and the place is super quiet.

title: (15169) Sada - 41 Aldea San Pedro
description: Off-season parking, in dirt and grass, right next to the Praia de San Pedro. The parking lot is on a slope, there are only 2/3 more or less straight spaces accessible when empty. Easy access (campsite next door). No prohibition. Public toilets 100m just before the beach.

name: Camping San Pedro - Sada
title: (15169) Camping San Pedro - Sada
description: Small campsite close to the beach, small in size, but in the absence of a nature spot, we had a good time there for not too much money compared to others in the area. Very hot showers, and many water points for washing up etc... Small restaurant nearby to save you from cooking, it's a change from Root's mode! The sector being relatively occupied by houses, it is a good solution while finding another more natural spot. Very friendly welcome from the owner…

title: (15169) - 2B Arnela
description: Clean, quiet and pleasant free parking with sea views, benches and tables to park comfortably. The beach is basically 1 minute from the parking space just below. It can be reached by stairs in good condition. There is no height limit for the car.

title: (15358) Cedeira - Unnamed Road
description: Pretty easy to reach on the side of a dirt road. Incredible view. Flat spot to park.

title: (15630) Miño - 12 Rúa Estremeiro
description:
Great river beach, plenty of parking with a small area to pay from 930 am to 930 pm.
Windy (just today?). great for a convenient beach day. Restaurants and shops nearby

title: (15177) Oleiros - 28 Rúa da Costa
description:
Picnic place with 3 stone tables, below a source of drinking water.
sloped parking for 6 vehicles and 2 level parking spaces for adults. Very quiet, you can spend the night, but respecting and caring for the environment, it is a Biosphere Reserve.

title: (15358) Cedeira - CP-2205
description: Free parking but steep, perfect to visit the famous village of San Andres de Texeiro, it is the road of the watchtowers and the places of bivouacs in full nature are numerous.  No service.

title: (15630) Miño - 19 Rúa Telle
description: A quiet, shady place in the morning, under a highway bridge, next to a park with tables and stone seats.

title: (15630) Miño - 26 Rúa Cobo
description: Laundry open all year.

title: (15630) Miño - 15 AC-160
description: Place to spend the night. Well lit. Without services. Wide parking. Good central area of Miño. Supermarket very close as well as cafeteria and churreria for a good breakfast. Beach less than 2 km.

title: (15358) Santo André de Teixido - DP-2205
description: Comparatively windless parking lot diagonally opposite the Miradoiro Cruceiro. Fantastic sunset and thanks to the protective pine forest in the back, the wind blows across the course. Great for one night or as a starting point for hikes and a small via ferrata.

title: (15358) Cedeira - DP-2205
description: At the watchtower possible to park a vehicle flat down the road. super quiet night with a beautiful sunset and horses at liberty in the morning ....

title: (15160) Sada - 10C Avenida do Porto
description: With a good view. Few places. Behind a supermarket and next to the sea.

title: (15160) Sada - 4 Avenida Sada y Sus Contornos
title_short: (15160) Sada - 4 Avenida Sada y Sus Contornos
description: Dirty parking but very useful when the area is full or occupied by cars. there is the supermarket right next door. very quiet night

title: (15160) Sada - 2 Avenida do Porto
description: A parking space to discharge sewage and refill drinking water, you can spend the night without problems and about 300 meters there is a dirt esplanade as a parking area next to a Carrefour

title: (15340) Ortigueira - 16 Lugar Cereixal
description: Very quiet place, next to a paved road where cars hardly pass. 150m after crossing the river bridge there is a picnic area. It is a wonderful place where the Mera River divides in two, forming an island. Nature and tranquility guaranteed. possibility of walking route. Also ideal for a bike ride. Highly recommended.

title: (15160) Sada - 48 Rúa Linares Rivas
description: Laundry

title: (15358) Cedeira - DP-2205
description: Beautiful spot! Small water point, wild horses, we could see a fox. a spot swept by the wind and quite cloudy, but it adds a part of mystic.

title: (15160) Sada - 36 Rúa Praia
description:
Picnic area next to the beach.
Many tables to eat and spend the day
Bathrooms next door and a few meters away a park for children and a little further away a larger one in the center of the promenade

title: (15319) Paderne - 132 Lugar Insua
description: Possibility of being able to rest and enjoy nature

title: (15630) A Ponte do Porco - 1 Rúa Alameda
title_short: (15630) A Ponte do Porco - 1 Rúa Alameda
description: Small dirt parking lot in front of the beach, flat, with rubbish bins and showers (closed in winter). Quiet to spend the night (we stayed overnight in January, in the summer season it is not ideal)

title: (15177) Oleiros - 23 Rúa Gándara
description: Outdoor parking on grass terrain. Small corner under fir trees. Mera Beach is 600 meters away. Quiet area. You have to come from 7-20pm to have room.

title: (15325) As Pontes de García Rodríguez - 13 Lugar Couce
title_short: (15325) As Pontes de García Rodríguez - 13 Lugar Couce
description: The car park is a soccer field, located in the middle of a quiet village with minimal noise at night. Next to it is a shed with water and some tables with benches. It also has a bar just 50 meters away (check Casa Picos opening hours). We have asked the neighbors if we could stay and we have not had any problems.

name: Camping Aguiar
title: (15167) Camping Aguiar
description: Camping Aguiar

name: Camping Green Village
title: (15167) Camping Green Village
description: Camping green village. camping on the beach.

title: (15630) A Ponte do Porco - 10 Rúa Alameda
title_short: (15630) A Ponte do Porco - 10 Rúa Alameda
description: Nice place by the river that flows into the sea. During the day there were a few cars here for picnics and dog walks, in the evenings and overnight we were alone. Very idyllic, but two noisy streets in the area. Accommodation for one night no problem. We felt very comfortable despite the noise from the street!

title: (15619) Monfero - Carretera Vnu
description: Space right after a curve for more than 15 campers. Between trees. Space should be used to make wood by the locals. Quiet and peaceful

title: (15167) Gandarío - 61 Lugar Gandario
description: Parking, open space. The police pass but do not say anything, they usually see autocaravans.

title: (15177) Oleiros - 8 Rúa dos Vinculeiros
description: Small car park with spaces set back from the beach at 100m. Parking in front of the mouth of a river. No service but quiet.

title: (15177) Oleiros - 68 Avenida María Pita
description: Free parking close to the beach and Lagoa park. There are no services of any kind but it is quite good, yes, there is unevenness and there is a small ramp to access.

title: (15177) Oleiros - 7 Rúa Celso Emilio Ferreiro
description: Cliff area between the Faro Grande and the Faro Faro. Very quiet place With panoramic views of La Coruña. There is a fountain and a wooden shed with two containers for waste (organic and non-organic).
